segments.text: I really enjoy it , especially when it ends up tasting good !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how often do you usually cook ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I usually make a few salads for lunch throughout the week and I make dinner about 6 times a week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's a lot of cooking . You must save a lot of money by eating at home so much .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I do . If you cook at home , you can eat healthy food cheaply .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what kind of dishes do you usually make ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I almost always make either a beef roast or a chicken roast with asparagus , parsnips , peas , carrots and potatoes on Sundays .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: do you make a lot of traditional British food ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: aside from the Sunday roast , we usually eat dangers and mash , toad-in-the-hole , or fish'n chips once a week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: my family loves spicy food . We often eat Chinese , Thai , Indian , or Mexican food when we're in the mood for spice .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: what's your favorite dish to make ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I absolutely love making mousaka , which is a Greek dish with eggplant . But it takes a lot of time , so I don â€™ t often make it .
segments.speaker: S2
